name: ZONE HUNT - IRL Hide and Seek
name_original: ZONE HUNT - IRL Hide and Seek
description:
A game consists of:
• One Seeker,
The goal of the seeker is to hunt the hiders down and eliminate them from the game.
• Up to 8 Hiders
The goal of the hiders is to stay in the game as long as possible by avoiding the seeker and staying inside the game zone.

STAY INSIDE THE SHRINKING GAME-ZONE!
After a certain time, the game zone will shrink, and your location will be revealed to the seeker.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR GAMES
• Choose whether to have a fast-paced or slow-paced game, you decide how fast the game zone will shrink
• How extreme will you go? You decide how large the game zone is

DISCOVER NEW PLACES!
In a new city? A game of zone hunt is a fun way to explore different locations in the city. You will also be surprised of how many new places in your home town that you will discover.

Important!!
• No Trespassing! Trespassing is Cheating (and is also illegal)
• Stay safe
